name: Penang Szechuan Cuisine Restaurant
address: 15228 Russell Ave, White Rock, BC V4B 2P6, Canada

hasMenuItem.description: Steamed rice, available in large or small servings.

hasMenuItem.name: Tsingtao Beer(330ml)
hasMenuItem.description: Tsingtao beer, a 330ml bottle, is an imported lager from China known for its crisp and refreshing taste.

hasMenuItem.name: Sapporo Beer
hasMenuItem.description: Sapporo beer is a Japanese lager known for its bright, medium-bodied profile, offering a crisp and refined taste with a clean finish.

hasMenuItem.name: Corona Beer(330ml)
hasMenuItem.description: Corona beer, a 330ml bottle of Mexican lager, is known for its bright, crisp taste with a balanced blend of fruity-honey aromas and a hint of malt.

hasMenuItem.name: Asahi Beer(330ml)
hasMenuItem.description: Asahi Beer, served in a 330ml can, is a Japanese lager known for its crisp and refreshing taste, often characterized by a dry finish. This beer is brewed using select ingredients under the supervision of skilled brewers to ensure a high-quality standard.

hasMenuItem.name: Heineken Beer(330ml)
hasMenuItem.description: Heineken beer, a 330ml serving of premium malt lager, is brewed in the Netherlands. This beer is known for its bright, clear color and a balanced hoppy flavor with a smooth finish.

hasMenuItem.description: Crispy vegetables roll served with plum sauce.

hasMenuItem.description: Malaysian style roti or pancake like served with curry sauce.

hasMenuItem.description: Dumplings stuffed with pork, vegetables and served with our tasty brown sauce. Choice of steamed or fried.

hasMenuItem.name: 9. Wonton Soup / 云吞汤
hasMenuItem.description: Wonton Soup typically includes delicate wontons filled with a mixture of minced pork and shrimp, served in a clear, seasoned broth, often garnished with scallions.

hasMenuItem.name: House  Special  wonton Soup
hasMenuItem.description: House special wonton soup typically includes a savory broth filled with pork and shrimp wontons, complemented by a variety of vegetables such as broccoli, zucchini, and carrots.

review.reviewBody: Food was overall tasty. They followed all instructions which was really great too. My only complaint is that the sesame sauce for the 38. Sesame Chicken / 芝麻鸡 was really watered down and had barely any taste.
Fresh, good quality food and large portions
Always accommodating of allergies, always delicious ❤️ Thanks Penang!
The vegetables are always perfectly done, the meat is so tender and the best flavor.
sesame chicken was tasty (and liked that it came with broccoli) but both it and the egg roll were not warm, and I live less than 1km delivery of restaurant.
